Articles.Content: With the new update and the limit on parts, making a munar lander has been difficult for me with this part limit early on. I can barely make it to orbit, whereas before I could easily just do some asparagus staging and get there and back in time for dinner. Does anybody have a design for a lander with tier one and tier two upgraded buildings?

There's a few dozen lower on the page

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/103878-18t-%28or-less%29-Returnable-Manned-Mun-Lander

a copule unmanned lander here

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/103925-Lightest-Mun-Lander-%28-return%29-you-can-build-w-o-upgrading-Buildings

manned lander with multiple material labs and goo pods for science gathering

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/103297-0-90-Mun-science-challenge

Plus the mission-1 I published in a few similar threads that gets mission-control, the astronaut complex, launch-pad and tracking centre upgraded in 45 minutes game time. ^^

There are many ways ...
This exchange of spacecraft has been moved to the Spacecraft Exchange.
